text: Alfonso Oliverio Elías Cardona (born 15 January 1941) is a Mexican politician from the Party of the Democratic Revolution. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Zacatecas. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Zacatecas Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Party of the Democratic Revolution politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Alfonso Elías Cardona
